title: Laura's Barbecue Chicken Pizza
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 skinless, boneless chicken breast', '4 tablespoons barbecue sauce, divided', '8 tablespoons pizza topping sauce', '1 large pre-baked pizza base', '120g grated mozzarella cheese', '1/2 red onion, thinly sliced', 'Freshly chopped coriander, to garnish']
